Super Bowl XLI will benefit seven university students from the sport management program and one professor PERIOD

Fritz Polite will join these students in Miami on Feb PERIOD  as they interact with other professionals in sports management to put on the largest show in the world PERIOD

Joining Polite in Miami are Jennifer Edwards M.S PERIOD Sport Management Sue Flamini MBA M.S. zach Franz M.S PERIOD Sport Management Chanel Lattimer M.S PERIOD Sport Management Chris Miller MBA Tommy Smith MBA and Lindsey Smith B.S PERIOD Sport Management PERIOD The group Team UT will be involved in several activities including event management marketing sponsorship corporate VIP hospitality and logistics PERIOD

These are all critical elements of staging a mega sporting event Polite said PERIOD

Specifically the students will be working the NFL On Location Function. this is hosted by the commissioner and is attended by all the major partners PERIOD

The students will be responsible for assisting the Host Committee in the operationslogistics to include communications quality control seating and general oversight and management of over  volunteers said Polite PERIOD

The students will also work on the NFL Sponsor Party to coordinate logistics associated with sponsor signage and designated assignments by XLI director Soulan Johnson PERIOD These assignments have been reserved for special VIP attendees PERIOD

Chris Miller a firstyear MBA is excited about the many professional opportunities as well as watching an impressive performance PERIOD

There will always be hype surrounding the Super Bowl said Miller who is also concerned with the many marketing techniques used at large sporting events PERIOD

Im concerned with companies and how they promote their products he said PERIOD

Not only will the students be in high positions of responsibility but they will be able to experience a megaevent and the essential aspects of an event of this magnitude Polite said PERIOD

Creating the essential aspects of events of this magnitude requires a high level of professionalism PERIOD Only a small percentage of select students were offered the opportunity to attend Super Bowl XLI PERIOD

The opportunity for the students to attend Super Bowl XLI in Miami speaks directly to their professional accomplishments Polite said PERIOD The selection process was rigorous and they superseded the committees expectations PERIOD The merging of theoretical concepts with the practical applications of the business of sport is a rare and unique opportunity. this all started in Jacksonville and Central Florida when Polite was involved with the Host Super Bowl Committee to bring students to Super Bowl  PERIOD He coordinated with the committee in Jacksonville to mesh theoretical concepts learned in the classroom with practical applications in the business and sporting arena PERIOD Through his work Polite continues providing experiences that merge academics with real world concepts that benefit the students future career PERIOD

Being around an event like this you learn through osmosis PERIOD You plan for an entire year for one day PERIOD This is about putting out fires Polite said PERIOD

One year of planning however doesnt necessarily guarantee perfection PERIOD Even on a professional level unexpected consequences occur PERIOD

Speaking of fires no one can surely predict the outcome of this years Super Bowl PERIOD Aside from all the statistical data the events of Super Bowl night are nearly a mystery PERIOD This fact demonstrates the importance of real world experience in a career like Sports Management PERIOD In UT Athletics the primary motivation for events like these is the opportunity to provide student experience PERIOD

The more they experience the more they benefit said Chris Fuller of the Athletic Department PERIOD

Many sports management students find themselves coming back to the UT Athletic Department PERIOD However Fuller is always motivated by opportunities to place students in professional organizations as well PERIOD This opportunity was made possible by the Miami XLI Super Bowl Committee UT Sport Management Program UT Athletics St PERIOD Marys Hospital and the college of Business Administration PERIOD
